description: The UK imposed a 14-day quarantine on all arrivals from Spain after a spike in infections.
title: Coronavirus: Spain races to save tourism as cases surge
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain races to save tourism as cases surge - BBC News
maintext: Many check-in desks in Terminal 4, which handles most flights to and from the UK, were closed. A midday British Airways flight to London Heathrow had only a couple of dozen passengers and many of those on board were Spaniards who live and work in the UK.
